overall_goal: Prepare banana florets and male flowers for cooking by peeling and removing stamens.

clips.subgoal: Peel male flowers and remove the inner flowers, placing them on the table.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Peel and remove inner flowers from a single male flower.
Peel and remove inner flowers from subsequent male flowers.

clips.subgoal: Peel banana buds and remove male flowers from them.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Remove male flowers from the banana bud.

clips.subgoal: Peel banana florets and remove the stamens, placing them in a tray.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Peel and remove stamens from banana florets.
Sort and organize banana florets in a tray.

clips.subgoal: Spill the banana flowers and remove outer cover repeatedly in a bamboo basket.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Pick, spill, and place outer covers of banana flowers.
Pick from bamboo basket, spill, and cut the stalks.
Spill and put down the flowers together.
